name: Project Odyssey Holographic Sticker
description: Add some sparkle to your life with these holographic stickers. Made from high-quality vinyl, they're easy to peel and stick, and their adhesive backing ensures long-lasting durability.

name: Project Odyssey Tote
description: A spacious and trendy tote bag to help you carry around everything that matters.

name: Project Odyssey Fleece Hoodie
description: Looking for your new favorite everyday garment? Get cozy in this adidas fleece hoodie.

name: Project Odyssey Tie Dye Hat
description: Bring fun and color to your wardrobe with this 100% cotton tie dye hat. It's stylish, super trendy, and will add extra pizzazz to any outfit.
imageAlt: cotton candy tie dye hat with project odyssey logo

name: Project Odyssey Dad Hat
description: Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor.
